name: Introduction to Programming
description: This course covers the basics of programming using Python. No prior experience required.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Learn essential data structures and algorithms to solve complex problems in software development.

name: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Master the art of building responsive websites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Database Management Systems
description: Explore the principles of designing and managing relational databases.

name: Machine Learning Basics
description: An introduction to machine learning with hands-on exercises in Python.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Learn about common cybersecurity threats and how to secure computer systems.

name: Software Engineering Principles
description: Discover best practices in software development, including agile methodologies.

name: Computer Graphics and Visualization
description: Create stunning graphics and visualizations using modern computer graphics techniques.

name: Artificial Intelligence Applications
description: Apply AI techniques to real-world problems in areas such as natural language processing and computer vision.
